column4: Why can't I wget -r -A pdf,doc http://www.fabricly.com? https://gist.github.com/1519382
Why can't I wget -r -A pdf,doc http://www.fabricly.com? https://gist.github.com/1519382
because you told it only to accept pdf or doc files and you're getting html.
but it doesn't make any difference if I add HTML to the list
